00029  SUBROUTINE VtkPlane
00030 
00031 ! Common Variables
00032  USE Domain,      ONLY : now, NX, NY, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00033  USE FluidParams, ONLY : p, u
00034  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f
00035  IMPLICIT NONE
00036 
00037 ! Required functions
00038  CHARACTER(8) :: filer
00039 
00040 ! Local Variables
00041  INTEGER :: i, j
00042  INTEGER :: IO_ERR
00043  CHARACTER(8)  :: filer1
00044  CHARACTER(16) :: fmtd1, fmtd3
00045  CHARACTER(17) :: filer2
00046  
00047 !-------- Set output files formats and names -----------------------------------
00048  fmtd1 = '(1(ES21.11E3))'
00049  fmtd3 = '(3(ES21.11E3))'
00050  filer1 = filer()
00051  filer2 = "DATA"//filer1(1:8)//".vtk"
00052   
00053  OPEN(UNIT = 12, FILE = filer2, STATUS = "NEW", POSITION = "APPEND", &
00054       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00055  IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00056    WRITE(12,'(A)')"# vtk DataFile Version 2.0"
00057    WRITE(12,'(A)')"MP-LABS v1.0"
00058    WRITE(12,'(A)')"ASCII"
00059    WRITE(12,*)
00060    WRITE(12,'(A)')"DATASET STRUCTURED_POINTS"
00061    WRITE(12,*)"DIMENSIONS",NX,NY,1
00062    WRITE(12,*)"ORIGIN",xmin,ymin,1
00063    WRITE(12,*)"SPACING",1,1,1
00064    WRITE(12,*)
00065    WRITE(12,*)"POINT_DATA",NX*NY
00066    WRITE(12,*)
00067    WRITE(12,'(A)')"SCALARS Phi double"
00068    WRITE(12,'(A)')"LOOKUP_TABLE default"
00069    DO j = ymin, ymax
00070        DO i = xmin, xmax
00071           WRITE(UNIT = 12,FMT = fmtd1)SUM(f(i,j,:,now))
00072        END DO
00073    END DO
00074    WRITE(12,*)
00075    WRITE(12,'(A)')"SCALARS Pressure double"
00076    WRITE(12,'(A)')"LOOKUP_TABLE default"
00077    DO j = ymin, ymax
00078        DO i = xmin, xmax
00079           WRITE(UNIT = 12,FMT = fmtd1)p(i,j)
00080        END DO
00081    END DO
00082    WRITE(12,*)
00083    WRITE(12,'(A)')"VECTORS Velocity double"
00084    DO j = ymin, ymax
00085        DO i = xmin, xmax
00086          WRITE(UNIT = 12,FMT = fmtd3)u(i,j,1),u(i,j,2),0.D0
00087       END DO
00088    END DO
00089    CLOSE(UNIT = 12)
00090  ELSE
00091    CALL MemAlloc(2)
00092    STOP "Error: Unable to open output vtk file."
00093  END IF
00094 
00095  RETURN
00096  END SUBROUTINE VtkPlane
00097 
00098 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00099 ! Function : filer
00100 ! Revision : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00101 ! Author   : David S. Whyte [david(at)ihpc.a-star.edu.sg]
00102 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00104  FUNCTION filer()
00105 
00106  USE DOMAIN, ONLY: iStep
00107  IMPLICIT NONE
00108 
00109 ! Function type
00110  CHARACTER(8) :: filer
00111 
00112 !-------- Decide how to name the files depending on the timestep (iStep) -------
00113    IF (iStep < 10) THEN
00114      WRITE(filer,9001)iStep
00115    ELSE IF (iStep < 100) THEN
00116      WRITE(filer,9002)iStep
00117    ELSE IF (iStep < 1000) THEN
00118      WRITE(filer,9003)iStep
00119    ELSE IF (iStep < 10000) THEN
00120      WRITE(filer,9004)iStep
00121    ELSE IF (iStep < 100000) THEN
00122      WRITE(filer,9005)iStep
00123    ELSE IF (iStep < 1000000) THEN
00124      WRITE(filer,9006)iStep
00125    ELSE IF (iStep < 10000000) THEN
00126      WRITE(filer,9007)iStep
00127    END IF
00128 
00129 !-------- Define the file name format depending on the timestep (iStep) --------
00130  9001 FORMAT('_000000',i1)
00131  9002 FORMAT('_00000',i2)
00132  9003 FORMAT('_0000',i3)
00133  9004 FORMAT('_000',i4)
00134  9005 FORMAT('_00',i5)
00135  9006 FORMAT('_0',i6)
00136  9007 FORMAT('_',i7)
00137 
00138  RETURN
00139  END FUNCTION filer
